!!! æ¥æ”¶æ–¹onï¼šè®°ä½ä¸€å®šè¦å†™åœ¨mountedï¼Œè¿™é‡Œä¸€å®šè¦æ ¼å¤–æ³¨æ„ï¼Œåƒä¸‡ä¸è¦å†™åœ¨methodä¸­ï¼Œå¦‚æœä½ ç”¨WebStormæ˜¯ä¸ä¼šæŠ¥é”™è¯¯çš„ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªbugéå¸¸ä¸å¥½æ’æŸ¥ï¼Œæˆ‘æ˜¯æ·±å—å…¶å®³ï¼Œè´¹äº†å¾ˆå¤§åŠ²æ‰æ‰¾åˆ°é”™è¯¯ã€‚

import mitt from 'mitt'

const emitter = mitt()

// listen to an event
emitter.on('foo', e => console.log('foo', e) )

// listen to all events
emitter.on('*', (type, e) => console.log(type, e) )

// fire an event
emitter.emit('foo', { a: 'b' })

// clearing all events
emitter.all.clear()

// working with handler references:
function onFoo() {}
emitter.on('foo', onFoo)   // listen
emitter.off('foo', onFoo)  // unlisten
